code: import React from'react';import'./Blog.css';import Image1 from'../../assets/blog-1.svg';import Image2 from'../../assets/blog-2.svg';import Image3 from'../../assets/blog-3.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const blogData=[{id:1,category:'Tutorial',title:'Get started with Lamini: Finetune a BASIC QA model for free!',metaTag:'11 July, 2023',author:'Rupsa',image:Image1,link:"https://medium.com/@rupsachakraborty2622/get-started-with-lamini-finetune-a-basic-qa-model-for-free-b26b9034d887"}];const Blog=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"blog container section",id:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Latest Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog__container grid",children:blogData.map(_ref=>{let{id,category,title,metaTag,author,image,link}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog__category",children:category})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog__thumb",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,className:"blog__img"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"blog__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog__meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:metaTag}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog__dot",children:"."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:author})]})]})]},id);})})]});};export default Blog;
